text_block_list.name: Newscaster
text_block_list.text:
Now, the curtain is finally lifting
on the URA Finals!

text_block_list.name: Newscaster
text_block_list.text:
This is the dream stage where the
star horse girls of the Twinkle series
compete for the top spot!

text_block_list.name: Newscaster
text_block_list.text:
Today, I'm pleased to announce our
illustrious runners! First up—

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl Fan A
text_block_list.text:
Hey hey hey, did you see what's
trending!? It's almost exclusively URA
Finals runners!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl Fan B
text_block_list.text:
The hype's really building! Hey, hey,
who do you have your eye on?

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl Fan A
text_block_list.text: Haha, let's say it together! One, Two—

<chrname> has been recognized for her
spectacular achievements thus far.

And accepted to participate in the
grand tournament where star Uma Musume
gather, the URA Finals!

I'll get <chrname> through the qualifyiers and aim
to win the whole thing!
